item.description:
The bride is getting ready for the wedding. This will be our chance to take photos of the bride & the bridesmaids before the main event.

We did end up finding a place that will work well for our bridal event. We might find some fall color but I thought we should make use of a great weekend after all this rain and get out there and shoot. Not too many such weekends left.

We can build on the reflectors techniques we learnt from Ichi at the commons shoot and add on any other off camera strobes if folks want to create some interesting photos and try something new. We have a have a bride or two, bridesmaids, groom and (maybe) a best man. There will be public restrooms at this location to allow easy outfit changes.

I realize this is short notice but lets see if we can pull it off. If you have specific ideas please email me.

Location - pictures are available here - It's 10 minutes walk from the nearest T-Station: http://www.mastiphotography.com/Notes/Locations/Piers-Park/19357285_rt2K95#1513252913_L8gh2GM

More info & directions: http://www.bostonharborwalk.com/placestogo/location.php?nid=4&sid=24

Models:

Nicole K - Bought wedding dress - http://files.meetup.com/830833/NicoleK.pdf

Leah S - Has beautiful wedding dress & a bridesmaid dress to lend - http://files.meetup.com/830833/leah.png

Eileen (Designer) & Fiancee - Wedding/Bridesmaids dress, head pieces for the brides 

Ashley - Bridesmaids outfits - http://files.meetup.com/830833/Ashley.png

Thierno - http://www.modelmayhem.com/portfolio/1708852/viewall

Nadia

Rita

 

Not confirmed:

Priya K - Indian Outfits

Alina Dar - India Outfits
item.name: Pre Wedding Festivities Photoshoot
